property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Map showing the location of Afghanistan

note.text: Afghanistan is a landlocked nation in the southern part of Central Asia. It shares a border with Pakistan to the south and east, Iran to the west, and Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan to the north. Its eastern tip borders China.
The Afghan landscape is arid and mountainous. It can be divided into three distinct regions: the northern plains, the central highlands, and the southwestern plateau.
